column4: Hey guys, is there a good guide for building pre-bundled install cd's for ubuntu? I want to build our app servers from a cd with a copy of our software and all dependant packages.
Just download the .iso file and burn it off as an image disc
thanks for the pointers, wolfwalker im not sure you paid any attention to my question :)
Fair trade, nobody could answer mine either :/ Sorry bout that though, I thought you were asking how to make an image cd of ubuntu.
